page_content: CRITICAL FAILURE: Latency Spike. Order execution time exceeded 2000ms (2 seconds). Price slipped 12 ticks against entry. Technical Analysis on 1-minute timeframe is invalid when latency > 500ms.

LOGIC FAILURE: Rapid Fire Sizing. The bot attempted to open a new position with 2x size immediately after a loss to recover PnL. This indicates a logic error in the sizing algorithm. Martingale strategies are strictly banned.

DATA FAILURE: Stale Pricing. The price feed for XAU/USD has not updated for 60 seconds. Indicators (RSI/MACD) are flatlining. Trading on frozen data will result in rejected orders or bad fills upon reconnection.
API ERROR: HTTP 429 (Too Many Requests). The bot is spamming the broker API with status checks or modification requests. This risks an IP ban. Reduce polling frequency immediately.
STATE MISMATCH: Ghost Order. The bot 'thinks' it is flat, but the Broker API reports an open position. This sync error creates risk of unmanaged exposure (no Stop Loss attached).
